scripts.build: rm -rf release; mkdir -p release/play; cp www/* release/; cp www/play/* release/play/; cp ../vorple/build/haven/haven.min.js release/play/haven.js; uglifyjs www/play/ui/hugo.js -o release/play/ui.js -c --screw-ie8; zip -j release/hugojs.zip release/play/*
scripts.compile: cd he; emmake make; emcc -DGCC_UNIX -s ASYNCIFY=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -O3 -o ../www/play/he.js he.o hejs.o heexpr.o hemisc.o heobject.o heparse.o heres.o herun.o heset.o stringfn.o; rm *.o he; cd ..
